title: Service
description: A service describing the entire form.

name.description: The name of your service, included in the header.

designSystem.description: Defining renderer. Values: gds, gcds, ouds, wds, nhsds and fcads. Default: gds

productName.description: Product name, used when the product name follows on directly from the design system logo. For example, GOV.UK Pay or GOV.UK Design System.

homePageUrl.description: The URL of the homepage. Default: '#'

firstPage.description: URL for the service name anchor.

cookieSecret.description: Value used to encrypt (AES) data in cookie.

cookieBanner.description: Definition of cookie banner. If not set banner is not rendered.

footer.description: Footer used at the bottom of every page of your service

links.description: List of links that will be added to footer meta section.

attributes.description: HTML attributes added to the link

pages.description: The list of pages in the form.
